name: jgroups-raft
tagline: Implementation of the Raft consensus protocol in JGroups
body:
### Welcome to jgroups-raft
The jgroups-raft project is a [Raft](https://raftconsensus.github.io/) implementation in [JGroups](http://www.jgroups.org). It is currently in its own repo because it'll move much faster than JGroups and I wanted to have the freedom to release versions in quick succession.

### Documentation
Manual: [https://github.com/belaban/jgroups-raft/blob/master/doc/manual/manual.adoc](https://github.com/belaban/jgroups-raft/blob/master/doc/manual/manual.adoc)
Note that the manual can be generated locally. To do this, check out jgroups-raft and execute `ant manual`. The manual will be generated in the `build` directory.
On my todo list: to update the web page automatically with the generated manual...

### Mailing list
We use Google groups for discussions: [https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/jgroups-raft](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/jgroups-raft)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
